data.message:
My (Revised)Verse inspired by #Eminem And #GunsNRoses

That bitch was so cold 
I should’ve worn a sweater
But I thought I could weather 
Whatever came my way 
However she was winter in summer 
Colder than December 
My 911 and it wasn’t even September
When it all went down in June if I remember
Because she was my November rain in June  
That brought me so much pleasure and pain
Before my number was up 
As she came through like a typhoon, a hurricane  
A volcano ready to erupt
And replace me with a tycoon 
But from day one she was always corrupt
